CustomField.formula: IF(Admin_Fee_Roll_up__c > 0, 0, Admin_Fee__c) + Drawdown_Total_w_o_payments_and_provider__c + Total_Outstanding_Previous_Loans__c + IF(ISPICKVAL(Payment_Schedule__c, "Yes"), Payment_Scheduled_Allotment_Remaining__c, 0) + Scheduled_Non_Facility_Treatment_Total__c + Total_Service_Providers_Allowance__c
CustomField.label: Amount Currently Allocated
